answers.text:
In 2007, the City of Santa Monica, CA completed a managed competition for solid waste services. The evaluation reports can be found here: http://www01.smgov.net/cityclerk/council/agendas/2007/20071127/s2007112708-C-2.htm 
There are numerous staff reports on this project, if you would like more information feel free to e-mail me at don.patterson@smgov.net.
